name: Grasshopper (Another Tale)
description:
OVERCOME EVERY CHALLENGE! LET COLORFUL CHARACTERS GUIDE YOUR ADVENTURE!

Hop your way through a stylized 2D world and overcome a variety of gameplay challenges. Meet colourful characters and make new friends on your adventure through Letfheria City.

Context

This game was developed for the curricular unit 2D Game Project of the MCs in Digital Game Development at the University of Aveiro, Portugal.

Features

  • Play 4 different minigames with unique gameplay styles and challenges.
  • Explore a vibrant world comprised of original artwork.
  • Meet a cast of emotional characters and help them with their tasks.
  • Experience a rich narrative and uncover the secrets of this world.
  • Immerse yourself in a calm and pleasant soundtrack.
